Mathison is currently in development. Expected release will be late 2017. Click here to see the log.

Mathison
A self learning and evolving solution to all your image sorting needs.
Select pictures and the Mathison will segregate them for you, classifying what's in focus and what's not, so you can focus on what matters.

How it works
